"Mamiya": "You will? Thanks. Alright, here's the deal."
"I came here as a member of this vanguard, but my main mission is to research Trainia."
"I'm sure you've already trained in both Cocoons and Towers, yeah?"
"But like, y'know, who the heck made them and what for?"
"That's what I'm trying to figure out."
"The ones in Aelio and Retem have already been studied pretty thoroughly, so I'm here looking for answers in Kvaris."
"But JEEZ it's brutally cold up here! The wind goes right through you. Hahah..."
"So yeah, I'd really appreciate some help. Can you go collect some Cocoon data for me? Thanks!"
